Turn NA into "NA"

Source: R/replace.r
str_replace_na.Rd

Turn NA into "NA"

str_replace_na(string, replacement = "NA")

Arguments

string

Input vector. Either a character vector, or something coercible to one.
replacement

A single string.

Examples

str_replace_na(c(NA, "abc", "def"))
#> [1] "NA"  "abc" "def"

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples

stringr is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
